content: MODIFICATIONS TO CARBON DIOXIDE SEQUESTRATION CREDIT. The text chunk discusses the limitation on the allocation and certification of credit for qualified carbon dioxide captured by carbon capture equipment at a qualified facility. The amendment specifies that no credit shall be allowed for excess carbon dioxide captured beyond the national limitation allocated under subsection (f) and after July 31, 2013. The amendment sets a national limitation on the amount of qualified carbon dioxide that can be captured by carbon capture equipment at a qualified facility. This limitation is the excess of 75,000,000 metric tons of qualified carbon dioxide over the amount captured before August 1, 2013. Additionally, procedures for the allocation and certification of carbon capture projects must be established by July 1.
